member.name: P:EVEC.Data.Settings.AppVersion
member.summary: The application version associated with the settings file

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.Settings.CheckAppVersion
member.summary: Checks the current application version against the version in the settings

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.Settings.BackupPrompt
member.summary: Prompts the user to backup the settings file

member.name: F:EVEC.Data.Settings.strDataDir
member.summary: Field to hold data directory. Value is initialised by the first read of DataDir property

member.name: F:EVEC.Data.Settings.strSettingsFileName
member.summary: Field to hold the name of the settings file in use. Value initialised by the first read of DataDir property.

member.name: F:EVEC.Data.Settings.objInstance
member.summary: Variable to hold the settings

member.name: P:EVEC.Data.Settings.DataDir
member.summary: The directory for all user specific data

member.name: P:EVEC.Data.Settings.SettingsFileName
member.summary: The file name of the settings file

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.Settings.NewInstance
member.summary: Method to return the settings file

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.Settings.Save
member.summary: Saves settings

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.Settings.Load
member.summary: Loads the settings from the file
member.remarks: If the settings file is 0 length or fails to load, then look for a backup copy and ask if that is to be used. Once a settings file is loaded, a backup is taken as a 'last good settings file'
member.returns: A Settings object loaded from file

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.Settings.LoadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the settings from a specified file path
member.param: The fully qualified filename for the settings file to be loaded

member.name: T:EVEC.Data.Settings
member.summary: Settings file for the whole project

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.ErrorHandling.ErrorHandler(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Handles exceptions thrown in the code and returns a custom message
member.param: Message to show the user instead of the error code

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.ErrorHandling.ErrorHandler(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Handles exceptions thrown in the code
member.param: The name of the method where the exception occured

member.name: M:EVEC.Data.ErrorHandling.LogException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs the exception to the debug line. Only included in debug builds

member.name: T:EVEC.Data.ErrorHandling
member.summary: Methods for error handling
